content.title: Privacy Policy - Cosmetic Surgery Thailand
paragraphs: When accessing our Website, Cosmetic Surgery Thailand will learn certain information about you during your visit. How we will handle information we learn about you depends upon what you do when visiting our site.If you visit our site to read or download information on our pages, we collect and store only the following information about you:

1. The name of the domain from which you access the Internet2. The date and time you access our site3. The Internet address of the website you used to link directly to our site.4. Name5. Last Name6. Email7. Phone8. Country9. Address

If you identify yourself by sending us an e-mail containing personal information, then the information collected will be solely used to respond to your message.The information collected is for statistical purposes. Cosmetic Surgery Thailand may use software programs to create summary statistics, which are used for such purposes as assessing the number of visitors to the different sections of our site, what information is of most and least interest, determining technical design specifications, and identifying system performance or problem areas.For site security purposes and to ensure that this service remains available to all users, Cosmetic Surgery Thailand uses software programs to monitor network traffic to identify unauthorized attempts to upload or change information, or otherwise cause damage.Cosmetic Surgery Thailand will not obtain personally-identifying information about you when you visit our site, unless you choose to provide such information to us, nor will such information be sold or otherwise transferred to unaffiliated third parties without the approval of the user at the time of collection.
One Pacific Place, Unit 1708, 140 Sukhumvit Rd., Klongtoey, Bangkok 10110, Thailand.inquire@cosmeticsurgerythailand.com
Tell us what you are looking for and we will send you all the information…

content.body_text: Home Procedures FACE SURGERY Alarplasty Cheek Reduction Chin Augmentation Chin Shaving Forehead Lift Full Face Lift Mini FaceLift Nose Implants Tip Rhinoplasty Nose Surgery Upper Eyelid Surgery Lower Eyelid Surgery BREAST SURGERY Breast Implants Breast Lift Breast Reduction BODY SURGERY Buttock Lift Buttocks Implants Liposuction Lipoplasty Tummy Tuck Vaser Hi Def Vaser Liposelection OTHER SURGERY Male to Female Female to Male Hair Transplants Hospitals Get Surgeon Feedback Privacy Policy – Cosmetic Surgery Thailand When accessing our Website, Cosmetic Surgery Thailand will learn certain information about you during your visit. How we will handle information we learn about you depends upon what you do when visiting our site. If you visit our site to read or download information on our pages, we collect and store only the following information about you: 1. The name of the domain from which you access the Internet 2. The date and time you access our site 3. The Internet address of the website you used to link directly to our site. 4. Name 5. Last Name 6. Email 7. Phone 8. Country 9. Address If you identify yourself by sending us an e-mail containing personal information, then the information collected will be solely used to respond to your message. The information collected is for statistical purposes. Cosmetic Surgery Thailand may use software programs to create summary statistics, which are used for such purposes as assessing the number of visitors to the different sections of our site, what information is of most and least interest, determining technical design specifications, and identifying system performance or problem areas. For site security purposes and to ensure that this service remains available to all users, Cosmetic Surgery Thailand uses software programs to monitor network traffic to identify unauthorized attempts to upload or change information, or otherwise cause damage. Cosmetic Surgery Thailand will not obtain personally-identifying information about you when you visit our site, unless you choose to provide such information to us, nor will such information be sold or otherwise transferred to unaffiliated third parties without the approval of the user at the time of collection. Home One Pacific Place, Unit 1708, 140 Sukhumvit Rd., Klongtoey, Bangkok 10110, Thailand. inquire@cosmeticsurgerythailand.com CAN WE HELP?
